summary: An ordinance providing for the condemnation, appropriation and taking of a portion of lot 3, block 7, Heirs of Sarah A. Bell's 1st Addition to the City of Seattle, for a public square and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor and providing that the cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law.
